MaxFacetValueCount.title: Maximum unique facet values per query (default)
MaxFacetValueCount.description: Specifies the maximum number of unique facet values that can be returned across all facets in a single search query when no value is specified or set to zero. The default limit is 250. To change this, update the app_search.engine.total_facet_values_returned.limit setting in the app_search.yml configuration file.
